---
title: "lab3-example"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r}
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

data <- read_csv("HandWashingData.csv")

```

```{r}

data <- data %>% group_by(sex) %>% mutate(count=n(), means=mean(washes), sds=sd(washes),
ses=sds/sqrt(count), cis=1.96*ses)

```

```{r}

summary_table <- data %>% summarize(count=n(), means=mean(washes), sds=sd(washes),
ses=sds/sqrt(count), cis=1.96*ses)

```

```{r}
plot <- ggplot(data, aes(x=washes, color=sex, fill=sex))

plot + geom_histogram()

```

```{r}

plot + geom_freqpoly()

```
```{r}
plot + geom_boxplot()
```
```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(x=sex, y=washes, fill=sex)) + geom_boxplot()

```

```{r}

ggplot(summary_table, aes(x=sex, y=means, color=sex)) + geom_point() + geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=means-cis, ymax=means+cis))

```
